posts.post_content:
Looking for M. Brown, Baker, Bell, Carrigan, Stone and Wallace.  

Raw or graded, either is fine.  pinholes, minor creases ok.

Hi Mark, 

I have Carrigan (SGC 35), Doyle (SGC 35), and Wallace (SGC 20) listed on Ebay right now. I could do $575 dlvd (paypal gift) for the three.  Below are links to the Ebay listings.  Let me know if you are interested.  

Thanks 
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
